item.title: Women in Film India Unveils Six Filmmakers for Toronto Delegation (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Women in Film (WIF) India has unveiled the six filmmakers selected for the country’s women-led delegation to the Toronto Film Festival, following a nationwide competition that drew more than 200
